channel.title: The Dictionary<TKey, TValue> Class :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: The Dictionary<TKey, TValue> Class In this section, we will discuss the use of the Dictionary<TKey, TValue> class, which implements a dictionary. In the next section, we will discuss how this data structure can be implemented using a linked list. In subsequent sections, we will consider alternative implementations. Note that the Dictionary<TKey, TValue> type has two type parameters, TKey and TValue. TKey is the type of the keys, and TValue is the type of the values (i.
